title: Provolone in Pizza Sauce
introduction: Provolone in Pizza Sauce is a delightful dish that features aged provolone cheese gently melted in a savory and spicy tomato sauce. This dish, reminiscent of a Neapolitan pizzeria, makes for a satisfying lunch when paired with crusty bread and a fresh green salad.
ingredients: 8 ounces aged provolone, rind removed and cut into 1/4-inch slices

instructions.text: In a medium skillet, bring the sauce to a simmer over medium heat. Add the cheese slices and sprinkle with the oregano. Remove from the heat and let stand 3 to 4 minutes or until the cheese begins to melt. Serve immediately.
